    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public Document parse(String fn)
        Name: parse Desc: It tries to parse the file with the name given first, as XML then, as SGML if we failed to parse it as XML last, return document if successful or null.

      • loadSegs

        public static void loadSegs(Node node,
            LinkedHashMap segs,
            HashMap ids)
        Name: loadSegs Desc: Loads the segments from the document objects. This document object assumes the existence of sysid field, which is ususally in reference file. Segment text and sysids are put into the given hashmaps.

      • loadSegs

        public static void loadSegs(Node node,
            LinkedHashMap segs)
        Name: loadSegs Desc: Loads the segments from the document objects. This document object do NOT assumes the existence of sysid field. Segment text and sysids are put into the given hashmaps.

      • writeXMLHeader

        public static void writeXMLHeader(BufferedWriter xml,
                  String hyp_fn,
                  String ref_fn,
                  boolean caseon)
        Name: writeXMLHeader Desc: Writes the header information to the given XML file.

      • writeXMLAlignment

        public static void writeXMLAlignment(BufferedWriter xml,
                     TERalignment result,
                     String id,
                     boolean istrans)
        Name: writeXMLAlignment Desc: Writes the detailed alignment for each word of the segments.

      • writeXMLFooter

        public static void writeXMLFooter(BufferedWriter xml)
        Name: writeXMLFooter Desc: Closes the tags for the given XML file.

        Name: join Desc: Joins the elements of the given array list with the given delimeter.
